description: Corporate Strategy & Planning capability supports the Office of the CEO
Corporate Strategy & Planning supports the Executive Leadership Team organizational unit

properties.rationale: Corporate Strategy & Planning uses Salesforce CRM for pipeline and revenue data to inform enterprise-level strategic planning and initiative tracking

description: Business Transformation capability delivered through Business Transformation Department
Business Transformation is an executive-led strategic capability

properties.rationale: Business Transformation program management relies on Microsoft 365 (Teams, SharePoint) for communication, project tracking and initiative documentation across two-segment reorganization

description: Corporate Governance supported by Legal Department
Corporate Governance capability resides in the Board of Directors Office

properties.rationale: Service Portfolio Management depends on the Rackspace Managed Cloud Platform (RMC) as the unified framework for tracking and managing the service catalog across public and private cloud offerings

Hardware procurement supported by Dell Technologies Alliance Department

properties.rationale: Hardware & Technology Procurement workflows are tracked through the Rackspace Managed Cloud Platform for capacity planning and asset commissioning across private cloud data centers
properties.assumption: RMC platform includes infrastructure asset tracking for procurement planning

description: Fanatical Experience delivers Customer Success Management
Global Technical Support capability supports Global Delivery Centers

properties.rationale: Global Technical Support is built directly on ServiceNow as the core ticketing system (confirmed: depends_on relationship already exists; ServiceNow is the platform of record for all support ticket creation, routing, SLA management, and escalation for 81,000+ customers)
properties.assumption: ServiceNow is the Rackspace core ticketing system confirmed by entity description and live domain

description: Service Delivery Management delivered through Service Delivery Management Department
Service Delivery Management supported by Engagement Management Department

properties.rationale: Service Delivery Management depends on ServiceNow for ITSM workflow orchestration, change management, service request handling, and delivery SLA monitoring across managed cloud services
properties.assumption: ServiceNow is the ITSM platform for service delivery management workflows

description: Talent Acquisition supported by Human Resources Department
Talent Acquisition & Workforce Planning delivered through Talent Acquisition Department

properties.rationale: Talent Acquisition & Workforce Planning uses Workday HCM for requisition management, headcount planning, recruiting workflows, and workforce analytics for 7,200+ global employees
properties.assumption: Workday HCM confirmed as Rackspace HRIS with HR Technology job posting evidence including talent acquisition module

description: Learning & Certification capability delivered through Rackspace University Department
Learning & Certification supported by Cloud Certification & Training Department

properties.rationale: Learning & Certification capability uses Microsoft 365 (SharePoint, Teams) for knowledge sharing, training content hosting, and certification program coordination for 800+ security-certified engineers
properties.assumption: M365 is primary knowledge management platform; dedicated LMS not separately identified

description: Employee Experience supported by Human Resources Department
Employee Experience & Retention delivered through Racker Experience Department
Employee Experience supported by Total Rewards & Compensation Department

properties.rationale: Employee Experience & Retention capability uses Workday HCM for performance management, benefits administration, employee self-service, and engagement analytics
properties.assumption: Workday Performance Management module deployed; standard HCM suite component

description: HR Operations & Administration delivered through Human Resources Department
HR Operations supported by Total Rewards & Compensation Department

properties.rationale: HR Operations & Administration is the primary operational domain of Workday HCM - confirmed as Rackspace global people system covering Core HR, Time and Absence, Benefits, Payroll, and HR Ticketing for 7,200+ employees
properties.assumption: Workday is Rackspace global HRIS per confirmed Lever job posting evidence

properties.rationale: Internal IT Management relies on Microsoft 365 as the core enterprise productivity platform (email, Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive) for all internal IT service delivery to Rackspace employees
properties.assumption: M365 is the primary internal IT productivity platform per job postings and 25-year Microsoft partnership

description: Enterprise Information Security capability supports Information Security Organization

properties.rationale: Enterprise Information Security is directly supported by Splunk Enterprise Security SIEM as the primary threat detection and monitoring platform with 13-month log retention, correlation rules, and ingestion from AD, firewalls, IDS, and endpoints
properties.assumption: Splunk is primary SIEM per SOC 3 FY2024 evidence

description: Internal Data & Analytics capability delivered through Internal Data & Analytics Department

properties.rationale: Internal Data & Analytics capability uses Salesforce CRM as a primary operational data source for revenue analytics, pipeline reporting, and sales performance dashboards
properties.assumption: Salesforce data feeds BI/analytics layer; dedicated analytics platform not separately identified

description: Financial Planning & Analysis delivered through Finance Department
Financial Planning & Analysis supports executive decision-making

properties.rationale: Financial Planning & Analysis uses the Billing & Revenue Management System as the primary source of $2.7B revenue actuals for budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning processes
properties.assumption: FP&A team consumes billing system revenue data for planning; ERP/EPM layer may sit above it

properties.rationale: Financial Reporting & Accounting is directly supported by the Billing & Revenue Management System as the revenue recognition source for $2.7B in annual revenues, supporting SEC financial reporting requirements and SOX compliance
properties.assumption: Billing system is confirmed revenue recognition source from SOC 3 and 10-K analysis

description: Treasury capability supported by Finance Department
Treasury & Capital Structure Management delivered through Treasury & Capital Markets Department

properties.rationale: Treasury & Capital Structure Management uses the Billing & Revenue Management System for cash flow forecasting, working capital analytics, and liquidity management tied to $2.7B revenue streams and $375M revolving credit facility
properties.assumption: Revenue management system feeds treasury cash flow models; dedicated TMS not separately identified

description: Tax Management supported by Finance Department
Tax Management delivered through Tax Department

properties.rationale: Tax Management capability requires the Billing & Revenue Management System for multi-jurisdiction revenue data used in tax calculations, transfer pricing, and international tax compliance across 120+ countries
properties.assumption: Tax calculations derived from billing system revenue data; dedicated tax platform integration assumed

properties.rationale: Internal Audit & Controls capability uses ServiceNow GRC for control testing workflows, audit findings tracking, risk register management, and remediation tracking under SOX Section 404
properties.assumption: ServiceNow GRC module used for internal audit management; standard ITSM platform capability

description: Revenue Operations & Billing delivered through Revenue Operations Department
Revenue Operations supported by Billing & Order Management Department

properties.rationale: Revenue Operations & Billing is the primary operational function of the Billing & Revenue Management System, which handles usage-based, subscription, and hybrid billing across the full $2.7B revenue base with PCI DSS Level 1 compliant payment processing
properties.assumption: Billing system is the direct operational platform for this capability per SOC 3 and 10-K evidence

description: Facilities & Property Management delivered through Data Center Operations Department
Facilities supported by Data Center Energy & Facilities Department

properties.rationale: Facilities & Property Management uses Microsoft 365 for facilities team communication, maintenance request tracking, and property management documentation coordination
properties.assumption: M365 is the communication platform for facilities management; dedicated IWMS not identified

properties.rationale: Sustainability & ESG capability uses Microsoft 365 (SharePoint, Teams) for ESG reporting data collection, sustainability program coordination, and investor disclosure preparation
properties.assumption: M365 is primary collaboration platform for ESG program management; dedicated ESG platform not confirmed

description: Investor Relations capability delivered through Investor Relations Department
Investor Relations supported by Investor Relations Department (secondary)

properties.rationale: Investor Relations uses Salesforce CRM for investor contact management, roadshow coordination, and shareholder communication tracking as part of Apollo governance relationship management
properties.assumption: Salesforce used for investor contact management; dedicated IR platform may supplement

description: Legal & Corporate Affairs delivered through Legal Department
Legal supported by Office of General Counsel Department

properties.rationale: Legal & Corporate Affairs uses Microsoft 365 (SharePoint, Teams, Outlook) for contract management, legal document collaboration, SEC filing coordination, and matter management workflows
properties.assumption: M365 is primary collaboration and document management platform for legal team

properties.rationale: Privacy & Data Protection capability uses Splunk Enterprise Security SIEM for data access monitoring, anomaly detection on personal data stores, and privacy breach detection across all data processing environments
properties.assumption: Splunk SIEM ingests data access logs for privacy monitoring; standard SIEM use case

description: Corporate Communications & PR delivered through Corporate Communications Department
Corporate Communications supported by Public Relations & Communications Department

properties.rationale: Corporate Communications & PR capability uses Microsoft 365 (Teams, SharePoint, Outlook) as the primary platform for internal communications, press release coordination, and stakeholder engagement management
properties.assumption: M365 is the primary internal communication platform; PR-specific tools may supplement

description: Community Investment & Philanthropy delivered through Rackspace Foundation Department

properties.rationale: Community Investment & Philanthropy program coordination uses Microsoft 365 for volunteer management, donation tracking coordination, and community engagement program administration

Thought Leadership & Technology Evangelism delivered through Technology Evangelism Department
